name: Contador
comment:
# Functions

@docs Msg, update, view, main

# Description

The functions bellow makes a counter on the screen and when you press
the button '+', the program makes a adction one on a model and when you press '-',
the program reduce one on the model text on the screen

types.name: Msg
types.comment: This type have the messages of the counter

values.name: main
values.comment: The main starts a counter showing on the screen

values.name: update
values.comment:
The update method recives the message when the userclicks
on the button and make the action of incrementor decrement

values.name: view
values.comment: The view method shows on the screen the buttons and the result of increment and decrement
